=UI Table Element=

==Details==

Tables are styled by assigning to them a specific CSS class: xe-ui-table.

Make sure you set {{{cellpadding="0"}}} and {{{cellspacing="0"}}} for cross-browser compatibility.

Tables require an extra {{{<div>}}} nested in all {{{<td>}}} or {{{<th>}}} like in the example below.
{{{
<tr>
     <td>
          <div>My cell content</div>
     </td>
</tr>
}}}

==Examples==
{{{
<table class="xe-ui-table" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
     <caption>
          <p class="f-left">Some text on the left</p>
          <p class="f-right">Some text on the right</p>
     </caption>
     <thead>
      <tr>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->title}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->writer}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->cmd_declare}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->readed_count}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->cmd_vote}(+/-)</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->date}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div><input type="checkbox" /></div></th>
      </tr>
     </thead>
     <tfoot>
      <tr>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->title}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->writer}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->cmd_declare}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->readed_count}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->cmd_vote}(+/-)</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div>{$lang->date}</div></th>
	<th scope="col"><div><input type="checkbox" /></div></th>
      </tr>
     </tfoot>
     <tbody>
      <tr>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><a href="/mylink">Some text</a></div></td>
	<td><div><input type="checkbox" /></div></td>
      </tr>
     </tbody>
</table>
